Wheaton.Maple Street Chapel:
The Maple Street Chapel, is a historical Gothic Revival building in Lombard, Illinois, USA. It is owned by "The First Church of Lombard".


== History ==
The congregation previously met in a building built in 1851 as "The Congregational Church of Babcock's Grove". The 170-seat structure known as the Maple Street Chapel and was dedicated on May 29, 1870.
